QuestData.Title: The Tides Turn Against Us
QuestData.Description: We cannot let the naga get away with this, $n. Slaying the keeper of the grove amounts to a declaration of war.$B$BYou'll find their den inside a cave on the island of Naj'vel, far to the southwest.$B$BI want you to send them a clear message.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. The naga seek the destruction and subjugation of all surface-dwellers -- do not hesitate to drive them out of our lands and back into the shadowy ocean depths where they belong.
